definition: deficient in intelligence or mental power
details:
adjective
- deficient in intelligence or mental power
= example: deficient in intelligence or mental power
- overly diluted
= synonyms: washy
- likely to fail under stress or pressure
= example: likely to fail under stress or pressure
- wanting in moral strength, courage, or will
= synonyms: frail, fallible, imperfect
- deficient in magnitude

- not having authority, political strength, or governing power
= example: not having authority, political strength, or governing power
- concerning verbs, having standard inflection
= example: concerning verbs, having standard inflection
- lacking bodily or muscular strength or vitality
= synonyms: weakly
- deficient or lacking in some skill
= example: deficient or lacking in some skill
- pronounced with little or no stress, referring to vowels or syllables
= example: pronounced with little or no stress, referring to vowels or syllables
= synonyms: light
- wanting in physical strength
= example: wanting in physical strength
- tending downward in price
